snippet: Hengjun Chao, 49, was charged with attempted second-degree murder after he allegedly wounded two men, including the dean of the Mount Sinai School of Medicine, where Mr. Chao once worked....
abstract: Hengjun Chao, former faculty member at Mount Sinai School of Medicine who had been fired, shoots school's dean Dr Dennis S Charney outside deli in Chappaqua, NY, in apparent act of revenge; Charney and another man are wounded in attack.
lead_paragraph: Hengjun Chao, 49, was charged with attempted second-degree murder after he allegedly wounded two men, including the dean of the Mount Sinai School of Medicine, where Mr. Chao once worked.

headline.main: Fired Professor Shot 2 Men Outside Chappaqua Deli, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Fired Professor Shot Medical School Dean Outside Chappaqua Deli, Officials Say
